title: Fatness, foods and fads
creator_credit: Tasmanian Film Corporation, Department of Health Services, Barry Pierce and Roger Lupton
brief_description: A group of characters with a variety of diet misconceptions are shown the need to balance their eating habits with the five basic food groups.
